pages.terms: UniqueCrafts: Terms of Use Home For the seller For the buyer Terms of Use Welcome to UniqueCrafts! These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of the UniqueCrafts online platform for handmade goods. Please read these Terms carefully before using our platform. By accessing or using the UniqueCrafts platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our platform. 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using the UniqueCrafts platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use, our Privacy Policy, and any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific features of the platform. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our platform. 2. User Registration In order to use certain features of the UniqueCrafts platform, you may be required to register for an account. When registering for an account, you agree to provide accurate and complete information about yourself. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for restricting access to your account. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account. 3. User Content You are solely responsible for the content that you post on the UniqueCrafts platform, including product listings, comments, and reviews. By posting content on the platform, you represent and warrant that you have the right to post such content and that it does not violate any third party rights or applicable laws. 4. Prohibited Conduct You agree not to use the UniqueCrafts platform for any unlawful or prohibited purpose. Prohibited conduct includes, but is not limited to, the following: Violating any applicable laws and regulations Posting content that is abusive, threatening, or defamatory Engaging in fraudulent or deceptive activities Using the platform to send unsolicited messages or solicitations 5. Intellectual Property The UniqueCrafts platform and all of its contents, including logos, graphics, and text, are the property of UniqueCrafts or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content from the platform without the express permission of UniqueCrafts. 6. Disclaimer of Warranties The UniqueCrafts platform is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of the content on the platform. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. 7. Limitation of Liability In no event shall UniqueCrafts be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the platform. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses. 8. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold UniqueCrafts harmless from any claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, and expenses arising out of your use of the platform or your violation of these Terms of Use. 9. Governing Law These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States. Any disputes arising out of these Terms shall be resolved in the state or federal courts located in the United States. 10. Changes to Terms UniqueCrafts reserves the right to modify or update these Terms of Use at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Terms on the platform. Your continued use of the platform after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms. By using the UniqueCrafts platform, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at UniqueCrafts@gmail.com. Thank you for using UniqueCrafts! Home For the seller For the buyer Privacy Policy Terms of Use

pages.buy: UniqueCrafts: For the buyer Home For the seller For the buyer Buyer page We will find you an author who will make your individual order in excellent execution Find FAQ Can I customize the product I'm ordering? Yes, we offer customization options for many of our products. Please contact us for more information. What is the estimated shipping time for my order? Shipping times vary depending on the product and your location. Please refer to the product description or contact us for more specific information. Can I track my order? Yes, once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number that you can use to track your package. What is your return policy? We offer a 30-day return policy for most of our products. Please refer to our Returns page for more information. Do you offer gift wrapping or personalized notes? Yes, we offer gift wrapping services and can include a personalized note with your order. Please let us know your requirements when placing your order. From intricate carvings to sleek modern designs, I take inspiration from nature and traditional woodworking techniques to produce one-of-a-kind pieces that add warmth and character to any space. Drawing inspiration from nature and geometric patterns, I create elegant and intricate pieces that reflect my love for beauty and craftsmanship. I draw inspiration from the world around me, incorporating textures and colors that reflect my love for nature and art. Each piece is lovingly crafted by hand, resulting in unique and functional pieces that bring joy and beauty to everyday life. pages.index: UniqueCrafts Home For the seller For the buyer Welcome to UniqueCrafts Here you will find everything your soul desires Find The history of the creation of the online store of handmade goods UniqueCrafts 1. UniqueCrafts online store was created by two friends who shared a passion for handmade goods and crafts. They were inspired by the beautiful and unique items they saw at local craft fairs and markets, and wanted to create a platform where talented artisans could showcase and sell their creations to a wider audience. 2. The friends started working on the online store in their spare time, designing the website and reaching out to artisans to see if they were interested in selling their products on the platform. They were thrilled with the enthusiastic response they received, and soon had a curated collection of handmade goods ranging from jewelry and home decor to clothing and accessories. 3. UAs the online store grew in popularity, the friends realized they needed to dedicate more time and resources to manage and expand the business. They decided to quit their day jobs and focus on UniqueCrafts full-time, hiring a small team to help with marketing, customer service, and logistics. 4. Today, UniqueCrafts is a thriving online marketplace for handmade goods, with a wide selection of products from artisans all over the world. The friends are proud of what they have accomplished and are grateful for the support of their customers and the talented artisans who make UniqueCrafts such a special place to shop. Choose Choose the best author Choose the best customer And if you haven’t made your choice yet, our selection of the best products we’ve ever sold will help you do so. pages.policy: UniqueCrafts: Privacy Policy Home For the seller For the buyer Privacy Policy UniqueCrafts is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you when you access or use our online platform for handcrafted goods and services. 1. Information We Collect When you use our platform, we collect the following types of information: Personal Information: When you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us, we may collect your name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment information. Usage Information: We collect information about your interactions with our platform, such as the pages you visit, the products you view, and your search queries. Device Information: We collect information about the device you use to access our platform, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. 2. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: To provide you with the products and services you request. To communicate with you about your orders, account, or inquiries. To improve and optimize our platform and services. To personalize your experience on our platform. To prevent fraud and secure our platform. 3. How We Share Your Information We may share your information with the following parties: Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our platform, process payments, or provide customer support. Business Partners: We may share your information with business partners who offer products or services that may be of interest to you. Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to a court order, subpoena, or other legal process. 4. Your Choices You can update, edit, or delete the information in your account settings. You can also opt out of receiving promotional emails or marketing communications from us. 5. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or modification. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. 6. Children's Privacy Our platform is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children under the age of 13. 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make any material changes, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on our platform. 8. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at UniqueCrafts@gmail.com. By using our platform, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting UniqueCrafts with your information. Home For the seller For the buyer Privacy Policy Terms of Use
